```{r}
library(sf)
library(geojsonio)
library(tidyverse)
countries <- read_sf(system.file("extdata", "ne_10m_admin_0_countries/ne_10m_admin_0_countries.shp", package = "reversegeocoder")) %>% 
  select(ADM0_A3)
countries_json <- geojson_list(countries) %>% unclass()
ctx <- rg_load_polygons(countries_json)
point <- c(30.5, 50.5)
points <- rep(list(point), 1000)
profvis(replicate(1000, rg_query(ctx, point, "ADM0_A3")))
profvis(rg_batch_query(ctx, points, "ADM0_A3"))
```
